pageContext.claim: “Great reviews on our handling of Covid 19, sometimes referred to as the China Virus. Ventilators, Testing, Medical Supply Distribution, we made a lot of Governors look very good - And got no credit for so doing. Most importantly, we helped a lot of great people!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is one of the few national political figures who refer to covid-19 as “China Virus.” Moreover, it is widely acknowledged that early fumbles in the administration’s response contributed to the outsized number of covid-19 cases and deaths in the U.S. It is unclear where Trump saw these rave reviews.
